portfolio.name: Hard Drive Racer
portfolio.description: This is a group project racing game using the game engine Torque3D. This is a racing game to avoid obstacles and get the fastest time and one of my most favourite projects that I've worked on.

portfolio.name: Barrels
portfolio.description: These barrels are part of a 3D asset library that I created for my final graduation presentation.
